I help people put their creativity to work

One good idea can transform a business from mediocre to extraordinary. Yet, many regard creativity as the preserve of artists and designers. I believe that anyone is capable of exceptional ideas — regardless of what job they do.

I help people unleash their creative potential, not by relying on unlikely “eureka” moments but through a systematic approach. Unexpected ideas then become a natural output of the process.
